column4: I've just switched from Debian to Ubuntu, although the less said about that the better.
let me guess -- debian packages are starting to get outdated? :)

Two things, really. More updated software in Ubuntu, and having tried to get MythTV to work in Debian I decided that there had to be a better way, a way where not everything with the computer was a fight. I thought Ubuntu was that way.
pretty much the same reason why i switched too
